subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: With Rafael Soriano, Nick Swisher and Hiroki Kuroda all declining the team’s one-year, $13.3 million offer, the Yankees will now begin to determine which of the three players, if any, will come back.
snippet: With Rafael Soriano, Nick Swisher and Hiroki Kuroda all declining the team’s one-year, $13.3 million offer, the Yankees will now begin to determine which of the three players, if any, will come back.
